init.title: Savant Energy Options
init.description:
Field descriptions: 
IP Address (The address of your Savant controller), 
Port (Port for energy snapshot data, default: 2000), 
OLA Port (Port for DMX/OLA API, default: 9090), 
Scan Interval (How often to poll for new data in seconds, default: 15), 
Breaker Cooldown (Minimum seconds between relay toggles, default: 30), 
DMX Testing Mode (Makes all DMX commands sent to console only for testing), 
DMX Address Cache (Enable DMX address caching for faster HASS loading), 
Disable Scene Builder (Removes loading of scene build card and backend).
